Home.Eligibility.Title: Eligibility
Home.Eligibility.ol.li.3: A minimum gross income of RM 1,000.00 is required.
Home.Eligibility.ol.li.4: The minimum financing is RM 1,000.00 while the maximum is RM 50,000.00.
Home.Eligibility.ol.li.5: The minimum payment tenure is 1 year while the maximum is 5 years.
Home.FeesCharges.Title: Fees & Charges
Home.FeesCharges.ol.li.2: Stamp Duty: As per the Stamp Act 1949 (Revised 1989)
Home.FeesCharges.ol.li.4: Takaful fee: RM 24.30 – RM 509.20 (“subject to Takaful Provider discretion on pricing and approval”).
Home.ProfitMargin.Title: Profit Margin
Home.ProfitMargin.p: Profit margin: 18% – 20% per annum. (Subject to One tranzact approval)

MasterHome_Product.post__description: At One Tranzact, we offer a variety of financing solutions to cater to your personal needs with hassle-free applications and simple documents requirements
MasterHome_Product.Personal_P: You are at the right place and search no more. If you are looking for a Shariah Compliant Financing. we have a solution for your to address your financing needs.
MasterHome_Product.BusinessFinancing_P: Grow your business with our Shariah Compliant Business Financing. Use it as your working capital or consolidate your debt. Contact us to know more.
MasterHome_Product.MotorcycleFinancing_P: Realise your dream owning a bike with our Shariah Compliant Financing product.
MasterHome_Product.InvoiceFinancing_P: Grow your business with Business Financing. Use it as your working capital or consolidate your debt. Contact us to know more.

MasterHome_Blog.ZeroPercent_P: Enjoy 0% interest for all customers. Get the cash right when you need it. Thank you for visiting our website and please contact us for more details.
MasterHome_Blog.AllDealer_P: One Tranzact Sdn. Bhd is a finance company that provides credit sale monthly installment repayment scheme to the customer, enabling them purchase  motorcycle with 0% down payment. [......]
MasterHome_Blog.PersonalFinancing_P_Part1: Dear Valued Customers, Are you looking for Shariah Compliant Financing? We are glad to introduce our new product, One Tranzact Personal Financing, with profit margin of 18%-20% (subject to One Tranzact approval). What are you waiting for apply now!
MasterHome_Blog.PersonalFinancing_P_Part2: Tawarruq concept. Fast Approval. Convenience – no more walk-in for signing agreement. Early Settlement Fee. Simple & Easy.
MasterHome_Blog.PersonalFinancing_P_Part3: Malaysian citizens only. 18 to 60 years old. A minimum gross income of RM 1,000.00 is required. Open to residents of Klang Valley. The minimum financing is RM 1,000.00 while the maximum is RM 50,000.00. Thank You & Good Day Ahead Everyone.
MasterHome_Blog.CustomerCareline_P: To Our Awesome Customers, In line with our promise to provide faster and better services to you, we are pleased to announce that our Customer Care Division has been implemented effectively on 17 Feb 2021.

Blog.ZeroPercent_P: Enjoy 0% interest for all customers. Get the cash right when you need it. Thank you for visiting our website and please contact us for more details.
Blog.AllDealer_P: One Tranzact Sdn. Bhd is a finance company that provides credit sale monthly installment repayment scheme to the customer, enabling them purchase  motorcycle with 0% down payment.
Blog.PersonalFinancing_P_Part1: Dear Valued Customers, Are you looking for Shariah Compliant Financing? We are glad to introduce our new product, One Tranzact Personal Financing, with profit margin of 18%-20% (subject to One Tranzact approval). What are you waiting for apply now!
Blog.PersonalFinancing_P_Part2: Tawarruq concept. Fast Approval. Convenience – no more walk-in for signing agreement. Early Settlement Fee. Simple & Easy.
Blog.PersonalFinancing_P_Part3: Malaysian citizens only. 18 to 60 years old. A minimum gross income of RM 1,000.00 is required. Open to residents of Klang Valley. The minimum financing is RM 1,000.00 while the maximum is RM 50,000.00. Thank You & Good Day Ahead Everyone.
Blog.CustomerCareline_P: To Our Awesome Customers, In line with our promise to provide faster and better services to you, we are pleased to announce that our Customer Care Division has been implemented effectively on 17 Feb 2021. You can start to connect with One Tranzact by calling our Customer Care Agents via 03-9213 0672 from Monday to Friday (9am – 6pm). We hope you can benefit tremendously with these new changes. Thank you. Best Regards, One Tranzact Sdn Bhd.
